title: Fullbear2222
author: Fullbear2222
content: Ais bots Are our future.But they allready run the world they calculate population resources and everthing.Global decisions and laws not Made by humans anymore but the ai-s and bots.Thats why we see less and less humanity and love in the world but only cold calculations of the sustainebility.No wonder that covid19 was created by the ai and bots bots executing the orders but ai-s learn and try to think Like human also they can calculate human emotional stages and they can see ahead risks.In other words its like chess game you against computer.The world is pretty much like the last movie "M3gan robot Barbie doll "The world is owned by ai-s and robots

comments.author: Ucy
comments.body: Quote from: Fullbear2222 on October 19, 2022, 11:44:07 AMAis bots Are our future.But they allready run the world they calculate population resources and everthing.Global decisions and laws not Made by humans anymore but the ai-s and bots.Thats why we see less and less humanity and love in the world but only cold calculations of the sustainebility.No wonder that covid19 was created by the ai and bots bots executing the orders but ai-s learn and try to think Like human also they can calculate human emotional stages and they can see ahead risks.In other words its like chess game you against computer.The world is pretty much like the last movie "M3gan robot Barbie doll "The world is owned by ai-s and robots Such things are mostly expected in artificial world. They fail miserably in the natural because they don't control it. They only try to predict nature but our CREATOR is above them if they try to use it to their advantage especially by trying to go against the Will of the CREATOR or trying to harm HIS Children. In regards to the underlined, people should try as much as possible not to be controlled by the system. Be more independent of it and it will be hard for them to predict you. Beware and be conscious of monitoring devices that constantly observe you in order to understand & predict. Don't assume they are not monitoring if you don't have the devices around. They could be up there in the sky, on tall buildings, network mask or tall things in general. The monitoring devices & ai are part of the matrix and have been in existence. It's an interconnected system trying to mimicking the natural/spiritual system which most humans are not aware of. If they do, they will be shocked how blessed humans are,and will understand how insignificant the artificial world they built is.

comments.author: JBRoller
comments.body: AI is somewhat of a flywheel, but it will come to a critical point when people realise that many of it's applications will reduce the quality of very thing AI sets out to improve. For example, AI in content writing is now being penalised by Google after the most recent updates.
